productSchema.description: Usage message for a Dedicated vCloud server license and support.
productSchema.attribute: The power status of the device. Usage events will not be sent for servers with a powerStatus of OFF.

attribute.name: coreStatus
attribute.allowedValues: ONLINE_COMPLETE UNDER_REPAIR REKICK MIGRATION_SERVER REACTIVATION COMPROMISED SUSPENDED_VM SUSPENDED_VM_REPLICATION

productSchema.attribute: The status of the device in CORE system. Usage events will not be sent for servers with a coreStatus not in this list of allowedValues.

attribute.name: applicationLicense
attribute.allowedValues: MBU_MS_EXCHANGE_AGENT MBU_MSSQL_AGENT MBU_MSSQL_AGENT_CLUSTERING MBU_MYSQL_AGENT MBU_ORACLE_AGENT MBU_MS_SHAREPOINT_AGENT MBU_CLUSTER_AGENT MBU_LBU_DEDICATED_TAPE_DRIVE MSSQL_2008_WEB MSSQL_2008_STD MSSQL_2008_ENT MSSQL_2012_WEB MSSQL_2012_STD MSSQL_2012_ENT NIMBUS_MON_LINUX NIMBUS_MON_WINDOWS SCOM_MON_WINDOWS MS_TERMINAL_SERVICES

productSchema.attribute: An application license on this server. If a server has multiple app licenses on a server, multiple usage events will be sent for those licenses.

attribute.name: applicationSupport
attribute.allowedValues: MBU_MS_EXCHANGE_AGENT MBU_MSSQL_AGENT MBU_MSSQL_AGENT_CLUSTERING MBU_MYSQL_AGENT MBU_ORACLE_AGENT MBU_MS_SHAREPOINT_AGENT MBU_CLUSTER_AGENT MBU_LBU_DEDICATED_TAPE_DRIVE MSSQL_2008_WEB MSSQL_2008_STD MSSQL_2008_ENT MSSQL_2012_WEB MSSQL_2012_STD MSSQL_2012_ENT NIMBUS_MON_LINUX NIMBUS_MON_WINDOWS SCOM_MON_WINDOWS MS_TERMINAL_SERVICES

productSchema.attribute: An application that is supported on this server. If a server has multiple apps that are supported on a server, multiple usage events will be sent for those apps.
The Guest OS for this server.

xpathAssertion.test: if (@applicationLicense) then not(@applicationSupport) and not(@guestOSSupportType) else true()

productSchema.xpathAssertion: If 'applicationLicense' attribute is specified, then 'applicationSupport' and 'guestOSSupportType' attribute should not be specified.

xpathAssertion.test: if (@applicationSupport) then not(@applicationLicense) and not(@guestOSSupportType) else true()

productSchema.xpathAssertion: If 'applicationSupport' attribute is specified, then 'applicationLicense' and 'guestOSSupportType' attribute should not be specified.

xpathAssertion.test: if (@guestOSSupportType) then not(@applicationLicense) and not(@applicationSupport) else true()

productSchema.xpathAssertion: If 'guestOSSupportType' attribute is specified, then 'applicationLicense' and 'applicationSupport' attribute should not be specified.
